page.title: 07RELIGION
page.content: There are six churches in our area. The main religion in this area is Christianity, the predominant form being Church of England although there are Methodist, Catholic, Baptist, United Reform and Mormon groups. Services include hymns, prayers and readings from the Bible.There is a Sunday service every week.There are sometimes special services for festivals, like Easter and Christmas, and also for occasions such as weddings, funerals and baptisms. Part of the minister's duty is to visit the old and sick people and young families in his parish.A minister is usually responsible for more than one church. A new church for the Mormon Faith has been built at Wistaston this year and opened in June (1985). {BY JULIE ,EMMA ,KEELEY & ANGELA
